arts.ttl: Paul Warne addresses Derby County reaction as tension mounts after Watford defeat
arts.sum: Some fans made their feelings clear at the final whistle and Derby head coach Warne said: "I understand it, I am a big boy. Paul Warne says he understands the fans' frustrations after Derby County suffered a fourth straight defeat in the Championship at home to Watford.

arts.ttl: Irish in action: Callum Robinson strengthens Ireland case as James Abankwah plays big part in Watford win
arts.sum: Abankwah signed for Watford on loan from Udinese during the week, a popular direction of traffic between the clubs, and the former St Patrick's Athletic defender played for 75 minutes, winning positive reviews for responding in a controlled fashion to picking up a booking inside the first minute. There are some at Rovers who retain a hope that Kenny could return on a short-term loan move because of a rule which means he cannot play official games for three different clubs between July 1 of last year and June 30 of this year.

arts.ttl: Derby County player ratings v Watford as Rams sucked towards relegation zone - Leigh Curtis
arts.sum: Kane Wilson: Produced plenty of effort and willingness to attack the Watford defence and one cross should have been rewarded with a goal but incredibly Derby hit the bar twice in the space of 15 seconds. Paul Warne's side then fashioned their best move of the game when Kenzo Goudmijn released Kane Wilson whose cross to the back post was met by Mendez-Laing whose shot cannoned off the bar.
How the game at Pride Park unfolded as Watford claimed their first away victory since November.

arts.ttl: Watford take advantage of struggling Derby’s poor finishing
arts.sum: County are now just one point above the relegation zone.

arts.ttl: Paul Warne makes changes as Lars-Jorgen Salvesen decision made in Derby County team to face Watford
arts.sum: Derby: Zetterstrom, Wilson, Nelson, Cashin, Elder; Adams, Osborn, Goudmijn; Mendez-Laing, Yates, Jackson Join our Derby County WhatsApp group to get the latest Rams headlines sent straight to your phone.

arts.ttl: Derby County transfer state of play as double deal chased and exits predicted
arts.sum: Fresh from delivering a new striker, Derby County's work in the January transfer window is far from over in what is set to be a fascinating two weeks before it finally closes. Lars-Jorgen Salvesen's arrival from Viking FK has fulfilled Paul Warne's need for a striker, one who fits the profile of a mobile target man and will, he hopes, add something different to his attack.

arts.ttl: Paul Warne reveals Dajaune Brown transfer stance after Derby County deal
arts.sum: Paul Warne wants to keep Dajaune Brown at Derby County this month but is mindful of not stunting the striker's development. Join our Derby County WhatsApp group to get the latest Rams headlines sent straight to your phone.

arts.ttl: What do George Washington and Tom Cleverley have in common?!
arts.sum: Tom Cleverley agrees with the view expressed by the first President of America, George Washington, in 1799.

arts.ttl: Watford fail with €1.5m loan-to-buy bid for 24-year-old
arts.sum: Watford have seen a loan-to-buy offer worth €1.5m for Besiktas ‘keeper Ersin Destanoglu rejected, as per Sabah (via… The post Watford fail with €1.5m loan-to-buy bid for 24-year-old appeared first on The72 - Football League News.
